name: RiskEstimateType
title: RiskEstimateType
description: Whether the risk estimate is dichotomous, continuous or qualitative and the specific type of risk estimate (eg proportion or median).

concept.definition: dichotomous measure (present or absent) reported as a ratio compared to the denominator of 1 (A percentage is a proportion with denominator of 100).
A special use case where the proportion is derived from a formula rather than derived from summary evidence.
continuous numerical measure reported as an average.
continuous numerical measure reported as the middle of the range.
descriptive measure reported as total number of items.
